item.title: About
item.description:
My name is Adharsh. I have a keen interest in Free and Open Source Software (FOSS),linux,anime,movies,music,and most importantly any thing related to computers/technology.The latter holds a special place in my heart. In my free time, I often find myself contemplating various topics. I am particularly intrigued by the mysteries of life, including our purpose for existence.

Also maybe just a tiny bit of authoring logical statements in a specific programming language that convey meaning and can be interpreted by a computing device for the purpose of accomplishing predetermined objectives.

This is a website made by hugo. Source code of this website is hosted at codeberg

You can contact me by instagram , github , email
